summary: THE SHOULDER BELT ON THE PASSENGER SIDE RETRACTED BACK INTO THE HOLSTER.  THE BELT COULD NO LONGER BE USED UNTIL REPAIRED.  THE OWNER CONTACTED THE MANUFACTURE AND THEY REFUSED ANY ASSISTANCE.  A RECALL WAS ISSUED ON THE SEAT BELTS DECEMBER 1996 FOR MISSING OR INCORRECTLY INSTALLED SEAT BELT ANCHORAGE ATTACHMENT.  NHTSA RECALL CAMPAIGN #96V256000.    *NLM   *SCC  *JB
